emuInput.TitMainTitle: Alfred Diggs wearing dark pinstriped suit, and Barbara Payne wearing sleeveless dress with diamond patterned crinoline skirt and dark pleated bodice with buttons at waist, after being chosen "Most Outstanding Boy and Girl", at Herron Hill Junior High School graduation prom
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 1, 1958, pg. A18, reads: "MOST OUTSTANDING - Alfred Diggs and Barbara Payne were chosen the "Most Outstanding Boy and Girl" at Herron Hill Junior High School graduation. They also received Frontiers' Club awards, given by the club's secretary, the Rev. B. M. Hargrove. - Harris Photo."
